Package transaction

Class TransactionController

java.lang.Object
transaction.TransactionController
public class TransactionController extends Object
The TransactionController class provides methods to manage and interact with transactions. It interacts with the TransactionLayer to perform transaction-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static TransactionController getInstance()
      Returns the instance of TransactionController. If an instance doesn't exist, it creates one.
      Returns:
      The TransactionController instance.

    • getTransactionList

      public Response<List<Transaction>> getTransactionList()
      Retrieves a list of all transactions.
      Returns:
      A Response object containing the list of transactions and a response message.

    • getActiveTransactionByCustomerId

      public Response<transaction.TransactionController.ActiveTransaction> getActiveTransactionByCustomerId(Integer customerId)
      Retrieves the active transaction for a given customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The identifier of the customer.
      Returns:
      A Response object containing the active transaction information and a response message.

    • createTransaction

      public Response<?> createTransaction(Integer customerId, UUID barcode, String transactionType, String cardNumber, String cardholderName, String issueBank, String month, String year, String securityCode)
      Creates a new transaction with payment using a credit card.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The identifier of the customer.
      barcode - The barcode associated with the bike.
      transactionType - The type of the transaction (e.g., "24h").
      cardNumber - The credit card number for payment.
      cardholderName - The name of the cardholder.
      issueBank - The issuing bank of the credit card.
      month - The expiry month of the credit card.
      year - The expiry year of the credit card.
      securityCode - The security code of the credit card.
      Returns:
      A Response object with a success or error message.

    • getDeposit

      public Response<Long> getDeposit(Integer bikeId)
      Retrieves the deposit amount for a given bike.
      Parameters:
      bikeId - The identifier of the bike.
      Returns:
      A Response object containing the deposit amount and a response message.

    • pauseTransaction

      public Response<?> pauseTransaction(Integer transactionId)
      Pauses a transaction.
      Parameters:
      transactionId - The identifier of the transaction to be paused.
      Returns:
      A Response object with a success or error message.

    • unPauseTransaction

      public Response<?> unPauseTransaction(Integer transactionId)
      Unpauses a transaction.
      Parameters:
      transactionId - The identifier of the transaction to be un-paused.
      Returns:
      A Response object with a success or error message.
